bibl.title: The Greek Anthology from Meleager to Planudes.
bibl.note: Voir en part. pp. 379-387: Appendix VII. P. Oxy. LIV, 3724. Revised and updated version of a letter to Peter PARSONS dated 9. Dec. 1985. What sort of collection (selection?) might we identify behind the incipits?
CAMERON Alan, The Greek Anthology from Meleager to Planudes.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1993, 8Â°, [xviii-]414 pp., 1 tabl. et 1 front. ISBN 0-19-814023-1.
